game.name: Happy Dessert
game.description:
Do you love learning new kitchen recipes online? Are you a big dessert lover? Join Happy Dessert and allow yourself to run a lovely dessert canteen in your own style! Be prepared to take care of all the jobs right from hiring a new chef to finding out a scrumptious recipe in this brand new cooking game! Do not forget to arrange all the needful ingredients to prepare the tasty dish! Follow the instructions showed on the screen to complete the mission successfully! 
Lots of surprises are awaiting you when you dare to manage your very own cake shop in this cute and fun-filled simulation game. Do every task in a proper manner whether it is a job of making new recipes, gathering ingredients, hiring staff, or baking cakes. Keep your eyes on the bottom of the screen where you can see some menus. Follow any of these menus to decorate cakes in this one of the best girls games! Play wisely to earn points through which you can buy new recipes!
Your income and reputation will depend upon how you perform in creating and purchasing recipes and cakes. Do not forget to look into your scavenger teams and advise them to grab an exclusive array of ingredients! You will also have some cool furniture and accessories to adorn your shop. Show off your management and cooking skills to become a successful owner of a cake shop! Play more online food games for free on atmegame.com alone or with your friends, with no install required!
